title: Design Space-Based Instructional Design Science: Science Education Design Strategies for Preservice Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of secondary science curriculum and basic instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, performing PBL tasks to solve real-world science lesson design problems

learning_goals: Systematically solve science instructional design problems by applying a design space-based approach
Learners can define and structure a science education design space by analyzing educational objectives and context.
Learners can develop effective science instructional design solutions (prototypes) through peer feedback and iterative improvement in a PBL environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
